titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties speech to the commissioners at Nottingham, on Saturday the 13. of February, in the praise of Sir Thomas Fairfax, concerning the trust which was reposed in him by the Parliament. And his fidelity to His Majestie. With divers questions propounded by His Majestie to his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax. And Sir Thomas Fairfax his answer to His Majesty again concerning them.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Not Charles I's speech and Sir Thomas Fairfax's answer; a narrative.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
